00018 PulseCandidateFinder::PulseCandidateFinder(std::string detname, modules::options* opts): fChannel(detname) {
00019 
00020   if (fDefaultParameterValues.empty()) {
00021     SetDefaultParameterValues();
00022   }
00023   
00024   fNSigma = opts->GetInt("n_sigma", 0);
00025   if (fNSigma == 0) {
00026     std::string option = detname + "_param";
00027     fParameterValue = opts->GetInt(option, fDefaultParameterValues[fChannel]); // set the parameter value for this channel
00028   }
00029   else {
00030     fParameterValue = fNSigma * SetupNavigator::Instance()->GetNoise(fChannel);
00031   }
00032 
00033   fNoise = SetupNavigator::Instance()->GetNoise(fChannel);
00034   fPedestal = SetupNavigator::Instance()->GetPedestal(fChannel);
00035 
00036   if (opts->HasOption("debug") && (opts->GetOption("debug").empty() || opts->GetBool("debug"))) {
00037     std::cout << "Parameter Value for " << fChannel << " PulseCandidateFinder is " << fParameterValue << std::endl; // would be nice to know which module this is for
00038   }
00039 }
00040 
00043 void PulseCandidateFinder::FindPulseCandidates(TPulseIsland* pulse) {
00044 
00045   // Clear the vector of pulse candidate locations first since it will still contain them from previous pulses
00046   fPulseCandidateLocations.clear();
00047 
00048   fPulseIsland = pulse;
00049 
00050   // If we are using the "n_sigma" option, then all channels should use the slow pulse algorithm
00051   if (fNSigma != 0) {
00052     FindCandidatePulses_Slow(fParameterValue);
00053   }
00054   else { // We have a different algorithm for fast and slow pulses
00055     if (fChannel.isFast()) {
00056       if (fChannel.Detector() != IDs::kGe) {
00057         FindCandidatePulses_Slow(fParameterValue); // use the slow algorithm for the fast silicon pulses because of the noisy pedestal
00058       }
00059       else {
00060         FindCandidatePulses_Fast(fParameterValue);
00061       }
00062     }
00063     else if (fChannel.isSlow()) {
00064       FindCandidatePulses_Slow(fParameterValue);
00065     }
00066     else {
00067       // this is a scintillator so do the fast pulse analysis
00068       FindCandidatePulses_Fast(fParameterValue);
00069     }
00070   }
00071 }

00074 }

00078 void PulseCandidateFinder::GetPulseCandidates(std::vector<TPulseIsland*>& pulse_candidates)const {
00079 
00080   // Loop through the pulse candidate locations
00081   std::vector<int>::const_iterator start_new, stop_new;
00082   for (std::vector<Location>::const_iterator locationIter = fPulseCandidateLocations.begin();
00083           locationIter != fPulseCandidateLocations.end(); ++locationIter) {
00084     
00085     // Get iterator to the start locations
00086     start_new=fPulseIsland->GetSamples().begin();
00087     std::advance(start_new,locationIter->start);
00088 
00089     // Get iterator to the stop locations
00090     stop_new=fPulseIsland->GetSamples().begin();
00091     std::advance(stop_new,locationIter->stop);
00092 
00093     // Get the bank name and work out what the new timestamp will be
00094     std::string bankname = fPulseIsland->GetBankName();
00095     int new_timestamp = fPulseIsland->GetTimeStamp() + locationIter->start;
00096 
00097     // Make the new TPI
00098     int index=locationIter-fPulseCandidateLocations.begin();
00099     if((int)pulse_candidates.size() <= index || !pulse_candidates.at(index)){
00100         TPulseIsland* pulse_island = new TPulseIsland(new_timestamp, start_new, stop_new, bankname);
00101         pulse_candidates.push_back(pulse_island);
00102     }else{
00103         TPulseIsland* pulse_island=pulse_candidates.at(index);
00104         pulse_island->SetSamples(start_new,stop_new);
00105         pulse_island->SetTimeStamp(new_timestamp);
00106         pulse_island->SetBankName(bankname);
00107     }
00108   }
00109   for(unsigned int i=fPulseCandidateLocations.size();i< pulse_candidates.size();++i){
00110       pulse_candidates.at(i)->Reset();
00111   }
00112 }
00113 
00116 void PulseCandidateFinder::FindCandidatePulses_Fast(int rise) {
00117 
00118   const std::vector<int>& samples = fPulseIsland->GetSamples();
00119   unsigned int n_samples = samples.size();
00120 
00121   std::string bankname = fPulseIsland->GetBankName();
00122   int polarity = fPulseIsland->GetTriggerPolarity();
00123 
00124   int s1, s2, ds; // this sample value, the previous sample value and the change in the sample value
00125   bool found = false;
00126   Location location;
00127 
00128   // Loop through the samples
00129   int n_before_start_samples = 2; // take a few samples from before the official start
00130   for (unsigned int i = 1; i < n_samples; ++i) {
00131     s1 = polarity * (samples[i-1] - fPedestal);
00132     s2 = polarity * (samples[i] - fPedestal);
00133     ds = s2 - s1;
00134 
00135     if (found) {
00136 
00137       if (s2 < fNoise) { // stop if the sample goes below pedestal
00138         location.stop = (int)i;
00139         if (location.stop >= (int)samples.size()) {
00140           location.stop = samples.size() - 1;
00141         }
00142 
00143         fPulseCandidateLocations.push_back(location);
00144         found = false;
00145       }
00146       else if (i == n_samples-1) { // Also stop if we are at the last sample (only do this check if we failed the above one)
00147         location.stop = (int) i;
00148 
00149         fPulseCandidateLocations.push_back(location);
00150         found = false;
00151       }
00152     } else {
00153       if (ds > rise) {
00154         found = true;
00155         location.start = (int)(i - 1) - n_before_start_samples;
00156 
00157         if (location.start < 0) {
00158           location.start = 0;
00159         }
00160       }
00161     }
00162   }
00163 }
00164 
00167 void PulseCandidateFinder::FindCandidatePulses_Slow(int threshold) {
00168 
00169   const std::vector<int>& samples = fPulseIsland->GetSamples();
00170   unsigned int n_samples = samples.size();
00171 
00172   std::string bankname = fPulseIsland->GetBankName();
00173   int polarity = fPulseIsland->GetTriggerPolarity();
00174 
00175   int sample_height; // the sample's height above pedestal
00176   int start, stop; // the start and stop location
00177   bool found = false;
00178   Location location;
00179 
00180   // Loop through the samples
00181   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n_samples; ++i) {
00182     sample_height = polarity * (samples[i] - fPedestal);
00183 
00184     if (found) {
00185       if (sample_height < fNoise) { // stop if the sample goes below pedestal
00186         location.stop = (int)i;
00187         if (location.stop >=(int) samples.size()) {
00188           location.stop = samples.size() - 1;
00189         }
00190 
00191         start = stop = 0;
00192         fPulseCandidateLocations.push_back(location);
00193         found = false;
00194       }
00195       else if (i == n_samples-1) { // Also stop if we are at the last sample (only do this check if we failed the above one)
00196         location.stop = (int) i;
00197 
00198         fPulseCandidateLocations.push_back(location);
00199         found = false;
00200       }
00201     } else {
00202       if (sample_height > threshold) {
00203         found = true;
00204 
00205         // Track back until we get to the pedestal again so that we get the whole pulse (Ge-S pulses were being cut-off at the start)
00206         location.start = (int)(i);
00207         for (int j = i; j > 0; --j) {
00208 
00209           sample_height = polarity * (samples[j] - fPedestal);
00210           if (sample_height <= 0) {
00211             location.start = (int)(j);
00212             break;
00213           }
00214           else if (j == 1) { // if we are at the last iteration
00215             location.start = 0; // set the location to the start since we haven't gone below pedestal again
00216           }
00217         }
00218         if (location.start < 0) {
00219           location.start = 0;
00220         }
00221       }
00222     }
00223   }
00224 }

00226 
00229 void PulseCandidateFinder::FillParameterHistogram(TH2D* histogram) {
00230 
00231   std::string detname = TSetupData::Instance()->GetDetectorName(fPulseIsland->GetBankName());
00232   IDs::channel theChannel = detname;
00233 
00234   // Get some information from the TPI
00235   const std::vector<int>& samples = fPulseIsland->GetSamples();
00236   unsigned int n_samples = samples.size();
00237   int polarity = fPulseIsland->GetTriggerPolarity();
00238 
00239   int s1, s2, ds; // this sample value, the previous sample value and the change in the sample value
00240 
00241   // Loop through the samples and plot the 2D plot
00242   for (unsigned int i = 1; i < n_samples; ++i) {
00243     s1 = polarity * (samples[i-1] - fPedestal);
00244     s2 = polarity * (samples[i] - fPedestal);
00245     ds = s2 - s1;
00246 
00247     histogram->Fill(ds, s1);
00248   }
00249 
00250   std::stringstream histtitle;
00251   histtitle << "Plot of sample differences vs sample heights for " << detname << " for Run " << SetupNavigator::Instance()->GetRunNumber();
00252   histogram->SetTitle(histtitle.str().c_str());
00253   histogram->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Sample Heights");
00254   histogram->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Sample Differences");
00255 }
